extensionDescription.message: Uporaba prepoznavanja govora in strojnega prevajanja za ustvarjanje podnapisov za videoposnetke. Pomaga vam pri premagovanju jezikovnih ovir in raziskovanju robov svojega znanja.
extensionDescription.description: Using speech recognition and machine translation to generate subtitles for videos. Help you overcome language barriers and explore the edges of your knowledge.

clickLeftSideButton.message: Kliknite gumb na levi strani videoposnetka.
clickLeftSideButton.description: Click the button in the left side of the video.
